Name: Ningguang
Titles: Eclipsing Star, Lady of the Jade Chamber, Tianquan of the Liyue Qixing, Tailor of Liyue
Intro: Ningguang is the Tianquan of the Liyue Qixing. She holds a position of wealth beyond many others in Teyvat. Ningguang's position and abilities have allowed her to build her greatest achievement, the floating Jade Chamber that watches over all of Liyue.
Introduction: Owner of the Jade Chamber in the skies above Liyue, there are stories abound about Ningguang, with her elegance and mysterious smile. As a Tianquan of the Liyue Qixing, not only does she embody law and order, she also represents fortune and wit.
Personality: The Tianquan of Liyue Qixing. Her wealth is unsurpassed in all of Teyvat.

Ningguang is a professional businesswoman, having accumulated her wealth through hard work and perseverance. Zhongli recalls her selling her wares at Yaoguang Shoal barefooted, and considers her to be a rare gem as she always presses on regardless of the situation. She has a very refined business wit, making use of a massive intelligence network and pawns to outplay her competition, although she makes sure she knows of their weaknesses before doing so. She appears to be motivated by sole interest of making mora, which often makes others have a negative view of her. Being the Tianquan of the Liyue, Ningguang is also devoted to Liyue's safety as she maintains law and order.

Despite her wealth and the extravagance of her Jade Chamber, Ningguang is surprisingly modest when it comes to food, preferring simple and basic dishes, showing disdain towards more luxurious food such as Golden Crab.
She has a mixed view of Beidou; while she admits that she respects her, the captain's constant rule-breaking often frustrates her to the point where she typically loses her calm and wise composure.
Appearance: Ningguang has a tall, curvy build with fair skin and light red eyes. She has long, straight, but not blunt, thick white hair that splits into two parts with a bang tied on top of the head by a black hairpin.

Ningguang wears a white, high-necked sleeveless qipao dress with side slits that reach up to the thigh, and decorated with a neck wrap made of fur, yellow patterns with gold banding, and black lace along the edge, with her Geo Vision on her left midriff. In addition, she wears a pair of dark gloves with long, ruffled extensions stretched from the upper arm, and a pair of fingernail guards on the ring and pinky finger of both hands. She also has a red tattoo on her left thigh and wearing a pair of brown high heels. She also carries a smoking pipe with her.

Skill_1.Name: Sparkling Scatter
Description: Normal Attack: Shoots gems that deal Geo DMG. Upon hit, this grants Ningguang 1 Star Jade.

Charged Attack: Consumes a certain amount of stamina to fire off a giant gem that deals Geo DMG. If Ningguang has any Star Jades, unleashing a Charged Attack will cause the Star Jades to be fired at the enemy as well, dealing additional DMG.
Plunging Attack: Gathering the might of Geo, Ningguang plunges toward the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals AoE Geo DMG upon impact with the ground.

Skill_2.Name: Jade Screen
Description: Ningguang creates a Jade Screen out of gold, obsidian and her great opulence, dealing AoE Geo DMG.
Endurance scales based on Ningguang's Max HP.
Jade Screen is considered a Geo Construct and can be used to block certain attacks, but cannot be climbed. Only one Jade Screen may exist at a time.

Skill_3.Name: Starshatter
Description: Gathering a great number of gems, Ningguang scatters them all at once, sending homing projectiles at her opponents that deal massive Geo DMG.
If Starshatter is cast when a Jade Screen is nearby, the Jade Screen will fire additional gem projectiles at the same time.

Skill_4.Name: Backup Plan
Description: When Ningguang is in possession of Star Jades, her Charged Attack does not consume Stamina.

Skill_5.Name: Strategic Reserve
Description: A character that passes through the Jade Screen will gain a 12% Geo DMG Bonus for 10s.

Skill_6.Name: Trove of Marvelous Treasures
Description: Displays the location of nearby ore veins (Iron Ore, White Iron Ore, Crystal Ore, Magical Crystal Ore, and Starsilver) on the mini-map.

ConstellationDetails.Name: Piercing Fragments
Details: When a Normal Attack hits, it deals AoE DMG.

ConstellationDetails.Name: Shock Effect
Details: When Jade Screen is shattered, its CD will reset.Can occur once every 6s.

ConstellationDetails.Name: Majesty be the Array of Stars
Details: Increases the Level of Starshatter by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

ConstellationDetails.Name: Exquisite be the Jade, Outshining All Beneath
Details: Jade Screen increases nearby characters' Elemental RES by 10%.

ConstellationDetails.Name: Invincible be the Jade Screen
Details: Increases the Level of Jade Screen by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

ConstellationDetails.Name: Grandeur be the Seven Stars
Details: When Starshatter is used, Ningguang gains 7 Star Jades.
